item.title: BannerQuery my first library in PyPI
item.description: BannerQuery PyPI package: BannerQuery Package to consult databases from Banner by Ellucian. This library corresponds to part of the work of Sergio A. Mora Pardo ðŸ‘¶ Our current version: 0.0.2 Installation You can install BannerQuery with pip: pip install BannerQuery Documentation Documentation is available at http://sergiomora03.github.io/BannerQuery Tutorials are available at http://sergiomora03.github.io/BannerQuery/Tutorials.html Development Source code is available at https://github.com/sergiomora03/BannerQuery https://packaging.python.org/tutorials/creating-documentation/
